0.text: Innate: Shaco's basic attacks are empowered to deal 20 − 35 (based on level) (+ 25% bonus AD) bonus physical damage when hitting an enemy from behind. Backstab is affected by  critical strike modifiers.
0.html: Innate: Shaco's basic attacks are empowered to deal 20 − 35 (based on level) (+ 25% bonus AD) bonus physical damage when hitting an enemy from behind. Backstab is affected by critical strike modifiers.
markedPassages: 20 − 35 (based on level)
critical strike

1.text: Deceive and  Two-Shiv Poison have additional effects when they hit an enemy from behind.
1.html: Deceive and Two-Shiv Poison have additional effects when they hit an enemy from behind.
markedPassages: Deceive
Two-Shiv Poison

0.text: Active: Shaco becomes  invisible for a duration, and after a 0.125-second delay, he  blinks to the target location.
0.html: Active: Shaco becomes invisible for a duration, and after a 0.125-second delay, he blinks to the target location.
markedPassages: invisible
blinks

1.text: Deceive's  invisibility breaks when Shaco uses a basic attack or casts  Two-Shiv Poison, but not from casting  Jack in the Box or  Hallucinate.
1.html: Deceive's invisibility breaks when Shaco uses a basic attack or casts Two-Shiv Poison, but not from casting Jack in the Box or Hallucinate.
markedPassages: invisibility
Two-Shiv Poison
Jack in the Box
Hallucinate

2.text: After breaking the invisibility, Shaco empowers his next basic attack within 0.25 seconds to deal bonus physical damage, which is affected by  critical strike modifiers.
2.html: After breaking the invisibility, Shaco empowers his next basic attack within 0.25 seconds to deal bonus physical damage, which is affected by critical strike modifiers.
markedPassages: critical strike

3.text: Backstab Bonus: The attack will  critically strike for (40% +  35%) bonus physical damage.
3.html: Backstab Bonus: The attack will critically strike for (40% +  35%) bonus physical damage.
markedPassages: Backstab
critically strike
(40% +  35%) bonus physical damage
35%

4.text: Deceive will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
4.html: Deceive will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Deceive will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Shaco summons a box at the target location that becomes  stealthed after arming over 2 seconds, lasting for up to 40 (+ 10% AP) seconds. The box is  invulnerable and  untargetable to enemies while stealthed.
0.html: Active: Shaco summons a box at the target location that becomes stealthed after arming over 2 seconds, lasting for up to 40 (+ 10% AP) seconds. The box is invulnerable and untargetable to enemies while stealthed.
markedPassages: stealthed
invulnerable
untargetable

1.text: The box will spring out upon enemy contact,  fearing nearby enemies and reducing their  movement speed for 2 seconds, modified against  champions, who are also  rooted for 0.5 seconds. Enemy champions have their movement speed set to a static 100, reduced to a static 60 for non-champions.
1.html: The box will spring out upon enemy contact, fearing nearby enemies and reducing their  movement speed for 2 seconds, modified against champions, who are also rooted for 0.5 seconds. Enemy champions have their movement speed set to a static 100, reduced to a static 60 for non-champions.
markedPassages: fearing
movement speed
champions
rooted

2.text: Once sprung, the box will remain for 5 seconds, during which it will automatically fire at nearby  visible enemies every 0.5 seconds, dealing magic damage with each attack. If the box attacks only one target, it deals increased damage. Boxes deal bonus magic damage to  monsters and 50% reduced damage to  structures.
2.html: Once sprung, the box will remain for 5 seconds, during which it will automatically fire at nearby visible enemies every 0.5 seconds, dealing magic damage with each attack. If the box attacks only one target, it deals increased damage. Boxes deal bonus magic damage to monsters and 50% reduced damage to structures.
markedPassages: visible
monsters
structures

3.text: See Pets for more details about boxes.
3.html: See Pets for more details about boxes.
possibleConcerningAbilities: See Pets for more details about boxes.

0.text: Passive: Shaco's basic attacks  slow enemies for 2 seconds while Two-Shiv Poison is not on cooldown.
0.html: Passive: Shaco's basic attacks slow enemies for 2 seconds while Two-Shiv Poison is not on cooldown.
markedPassages: slow

1.text: Active: Shaco throws a dagger at the target enemy that deals magic damage,  increased by 50% if they are below 30% of their maximum health, and  slows them for 3 seconds.
1.html: Active: Shaco throws a dagger at the target enemy that deals magic damage, increased by 50% if they are below 30% of their maximum health, and slows them for 3 seconds.
markedPassages: slows

2.text: Backstab Bonus: The dagger deals an additional 15 − 50 (based on level) (+ 10% AP) bonus magic damage, increased to 22.5 − 75 (based on level) (+ 15% AP) if the target is below 30% of their maximum health.
2.html: Backstab Bonus: The dagger deals an additional 15 − 50 (based on level) (+ 10% AP) bonus magic damage, increased to 22.5 − 75 (based on level) (+ 15% AP) if the target is below 30% of their maximum health.
markedPassages: Backstab
15 − 50 (based on level)
22.5 − 75 (based on level)

0.text: Active: Shaco  vanishes for 0.5 seconds and  blinks in the target direction while creating a  clone of himself that is summoned in the opposite direction, remaining within control range of him as a controllable  clone for up to 18 seconds. Hallucinate can be recast at any time while the clone is alive, and can be used while affected by  cast-inhibiting crowd control.
0.html:
Active: Shaco vanishes for 0.5 seconds and blinks in the target direction while creating a clone of himself that is summoned in the opposite direction, remaining within control range of him as a controllable clone for up to 18 seconds.

Hallucinate can be recast at any time while the clone is alive, and can be used while affected by cast-inhibiting crowd control.
markedPassages: vanishes
blinks
clone
clone
cast-inhibiting crowd control

1.text: Recast: Shaco commands the  clone to move to the target location.
1.html: Recast: Shaco commands the clone to move to the target location.
markedPassages: clone

2.text: The clone will explode upon dying or expiring to deal magic damage to nearby enemies and deploy three  mini-boxes that activate instantly,  fearing nearby enemies for 1 second.
2.html: The clone will explode upon dying or expiring to deal magic damage to nearby enemies and deploy three mini-boxes that activate instantly, fearing nearby enemies for 1 second.
markedPassages: mini-boxes
fearing

3.text: The boxes possess  Jack in the Box's effects, except they have a doubled, but shared  health, and deal modified magic damage with each attack, increased when attacking a single unit.
3.html: The boxes possess Jack in the Box's effects, except they have a doubled, but shared  health, and deal modified magic damage with each attack, increased when attacking a single unit.
markedPassages: Jack in the Box's
health
